# Pull Request

Thank you for contributing!

Please complete the checklist below to help ensure the PR is easy to review.

## Description

Explain what this PR changes and why. Keep it focused and concise.

## Checklist

- [ ] The PR is focused and does not mix unrelated changes.
- [ ] The project builds successfully on Windows with MSVC.
- [ ] No new external dependencies or submodules were added.
- [ ] The change aligns with the project's goals (minimal, reproducible, Windowsâ€‘focused).
- [ ] I have tested the change with at least one LVGL demo.

## Related Issues

If this PR fixes a bug, link the issue here and include the testcase in the description.
